items.title: CBOE Futures Exchange Announces Launch Data For CBOE Short-Term VIX Futures With Weekly Expirations
items.description: CBOE Futures Exchange, LLC (CFE®i;) accounded today that it plans to launch trading of futures with weekly expirations on the new CBOE Short-Term Volatility Index SM (ticker symbol: VXSTSM) on February 13, pending regulatory review.
